show.subtitle: Your Economic Survival?  They're Not Looking Out For You.  We are.
show.title: The Wake Up Call

title: Mixed Messages
content:
An overview of recent history (5 years). The effects of the harm the Fed has wrought. <!--more--> The malicious nature of government policy.
What do we call this era: The Great Recession?
The Lesser Depression?
The Greater Depression?
None of the above?
MF Global customers all made good at 100%.
Maximum bullishness is always to be found at market tops.
This time is no exception.
The story of Snapchat, a company used by youngsters to take pictures of their private parts and which (are supposed to) disappear after 15 seconds.
Value: ten billion dollars!
It has no profits, no earnings and no business model.
A quick deconstruction of ‘the recovery’.
A severe critique of a NY Times reporter.
Some advice for the long weekend.
(Worldly wisdom)
